message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $130. I think it's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, $90 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $110. This price still leaves room for both of us to get a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $110, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

Bob, I understand you're working with a tight budget, but $95 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $102.50. This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from the deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92.50?
